data.trans_hint: Thật vô lý khi hi vọng ai đó sẽ lái xe suốt 3 tiếng chỉ để tới họp có 20 phút.
data.en_hint: It seems quite absurd to expect anyone to drive for 3 hours just for a 20 minute meeting.
data.content_game_1: It seems quite absurd to expect anyone to drive for 3 hours just for a 20 minute meeting.
data.answer_en_hint: It seems quite absurd to expect anyone to drive for 3 hours just for a 20 minute meeting.

data.trans: (Thường dạng bị động): Làm say đắm, quyến rũ
data.trans_hint: Những đứa trẻ bị cuốn hút bởi những cuốn sách của cô.
data.en_hint: The children were captivated by her books.
data.content_game_1: The children were captivated by her books.
data.answer_en_hint: The children were captivated by her books.

data.trans_hint: Họ lên chuyến bay đến Paris mà không gặp trở ngại nào.
data.en_hint: They boarded their flight to Paris without hindrance.
data.content_game_1: They boarded their flight to Paris without hindrance.
data.answer_en_hint: They boarded their flight to Paris without hindrance.

data.trans_hint: Lời nói của cô ấy ẩn chứa một sự đe dọa ngầm.
data.en_hint: Her words contained an implicit threat.
data.content_game_1: Her words contained an implicit threat.
data.answer_en_hint: Her words contained an implicit threat.

data.trans: Vô hình, không cầm nắm được
data.trans_hint: Rosie có phẩm chất vô hình mà bạn có thể gọi là sức hút.
data.en_hint: Rosie has that intangible quality which you might call charisma.
data.content_game_1: Rosie has that intangible quality which you might call charisma.
data.answer_en_hint: Rosie has that intangible quality which you might call charisma.

data.trans: Hấp dẫn, gây thích thú, kích thích sự tò mò
data.trans_hint: Anna có tính cách thực sự gây thích thú.
data.en_hint: Anna has a really intriguing personality.
data.content_game_1: Anna has a really intriguing personality.
data.answer_en_hint: Anna has a really intriguing personality.

data.trans: Liên tục, không ngừng, luôn luôn, vĩnh viễn
data.trans_hint: Anh ấy không ngừng tìm kiếm sự thật.
data.en_hint: He is on a perpetual search for truth.
data.content_game_1: He is on a perpetual search for truth.
data.answer_en_hint: He is on a perpetual search for truth.

data.trans: Điều giả định, cơ sở để giả định, điều/cơ sở để cho là đúng
data.trans_hint: Có một giả định chung rằng các bác sĩ luôn biết rõ nhất.
data.en_hint: There is a general presumption that the doctors knows best.
data.content_game_1: There is a general presumption that the doctors knows best.
data.answer_en_hint: There is a general presumption that the doctors knows best.

data.trans_hint: Bạn cần phải đánh bại nỗi sợ hãi của mình.
data.en_hint: You need to vanquish your fears.
data.content_game_1: You need to vanquish your fears.
data.answer_en_hint: You need to vanquish your fears.

data.trans_hint: Cô ấy trang trí gà với lá chanh.
data.en_hint: She garnished the chicken with lime leaves.
